price: “Donosimo ti radosnu vijest koja će se doista obistiniti”, rekoše oni, “zato nadu ne gubi!”
arabic: قَالُواْ بَشَّرۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِطِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū basharnāka bil-ḥaqi falā takun mina al-qāniṭīna
